about_the_game:
What's more fun than a great day at the beach? Making a fun comic about your seaside adventures!

ComiPo! Swimwear collection is filled with bits and pieces you'll need to create the perfect beach scene. A large variety of swimsuits ensures that your manga characters will have the swimsuit look that suits their personality. From swimmer essentials such as inflatable swimming rings and snorkels to summer foods such as watermelon and shaved ice, this collection includes all the essential props you will need to bring your scenes to life.

This pack contains:
  • 24 sets of bikinis and one-piece swimsuits for females.
  • 24 variations of swimming trunks and briefs for males.
  • 19 additional beach-themed items.
  • And more!

name: ComiPo! Swim Wear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: MicrosoftR Windows 8.1 (64-bit) / 10 (64-bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 128 MB or more, Pixel Shader 2.0 or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
